messages.content: Hey Ginny! How's your summer going?
Hi Harry! My summer's been great so far. Mostly just relaxing at the Burrow and playing Quidditch with my brothers. How about you?
Sounds brilliant! I'm staying with Sirius at Grimmauld Place. It's nice to just hang out without worrying about Voldemort for once.
That must be such a relief. You definitely deserve a peaceful summer for once! Are you looking forward to starting Auror training in the fall?
Absolutely! I can't wait to really start preparing to become an Auror. It'll be a lot of work but I think it'll be fascinating. What are your plans for after Hogwarts?
I'm hoping to try out for the Holyhead Harpies! Professional Quidditch has always been a dream of mine. If that doesn't work out, maybe I'll look into working at the Ministry too.
The Harpies would be so lucky to have you! I know you'll make it with your talent. Let me know if you need any Ministry connections down the road.
Aww thanks, Harry! I really appreciate that. I'll definitely let you know if I end up going the Ministry route. Have you heard from Ron and Hermione much this summer?
A little bit. Sounds like they're both keeping busy. Ron said Hermione's dragging them to museums and libraries whenever they get a chance. Typical Hermione!
Haha that does sound like her! At least Ron will be really well read when he gets back. It'll be so weird with just the three of us at Hogwarts this year though.
It really will be strange. The common room will feel so empty without you, Fred, and George causing mayhem all the time.
Right? I think Ron's planning to carry on some of our more...questionable traditions. Poor Hermione might have her hands full as prefect!
Oh no, you're right! Maybe I should give Hermione some tips on keeping Ron in line.
Ha! She could use all the help she can get. Though she'll probably have him acting like a proper prefect in no time.
I have no doubt she'll whip him into shape! Are you looking forward to being Quidditch captain? You'll be brilliant.
Thanks! I'm excited but pretty nervous too. I just hope I can do the position justice after you set the bar so high.
Don't be nervous, you're going to be amazing! The team couldn't ask for a better leader.
Your confidence means a lot, thank you Harry! I'll try not to stress too much before the term starts.
Anytime! Let me know if you need any captain advice. But honestly, you've got this.
I really appreciate that offer - I may take you up on it! How's your summer going otherwise? Doing anything fun?
It's been great! Sirius and I went to a Quidditch match last week which was brilliant. And I've been able to relax and spend time with Teddy.
That sounds wonderful! Give Teddy a big hug from me next time you see him. Treasure these days with him while he's so little.
I absolutely will. He's growing so fast but still as adorable as ever! Have you been able to spend much time with Fleur and the baby?
A bit, yeah! Little Victoire is so precious. Fleur keeps hinting she wants me to babysit soon so wish me luck there, haha.
Aww I'm sure you'll do great with Victoire! Just distract her with Quidditch stories and she'll be enthralled.
Haha that's perfect, I'll have to try that! If all else fails, a quick bat bogey hex will keep her in line.
Ginny! You wouldn't...though I have no doubt it would be effective!
Just kidding! Mostly... I should probably brush up on my lullabies instead.
Lullabies are definitely safer! Let me know if you need any recommendations.
I may just take you up on that if Fleur actually trusts me alone with the baby! How's Sirius doing lately? Keeping busy?
He's doing really well! Still getting used to being a free man of course, but enjoying having his own place...
Oh wonderful, I'm so glad to hear that! Give him my best next time you see him.
I will! He'll be happy to hear from you. Hopefully we can all get together soon, it's been too long.
That would be lovely! Let me know if you two want to meet up on a Hogsmeade visit. We could sneak away from Ron and Hermione for a bit.
Ooh good idea! Those two will be off in their own little prefect world anyway. A butterbeer at the Three Broomsticks would be brilliant.
It's a date! We'll figure out a good weekend once term starts. I can't wait to hear all your Auror training stories in person.
Brilliant, definitely! I want to hear all about the Quidditch team too. You're going to be amazing this year, Ginny.
Aww, thanks Harry! I really hope you're right. Either way, it'll be nice to have Quidditch to look forward to.
Absolutely! And I know you'll lead the team to victory. You were always the best Chaser of the bunch.
Ha, well I did learn from the best! I'll do my best to live up to your legacy this year.
I have no doubt you will! But don't worry about legacy, just focus on having fun and playing your best.
Thanks, Harry. That's really good advice. I'll try to keep things in perspective and enjoy the experience!
Exactly! You're going to be brilliant, Ginny. Keep me posted on how the team's coming along this year!
Will do! I better go get packed for tomorrow's train ride. Enjoy the rest of your summer! Talk more soon!
Have a great term! Stay in touch and let me know if you need anything!
Hey Harry! We're a few weeks into term and Quidditch is going well so far. The new players seem really promising!
Ginny, that's awesome to hear! I knew you'd be a brilliant captain. Keep up the great work!
Thanks! I'm trying my best. Our first match is coming up against Ravenclaw soon so feeling a bit nervous about that.
You're going to be amazing! Just focus on your strengths as a team. And try to relax and have fun!
Those are really good reminders, I appreciate it! I'll let you know how the Ravenclaw match goes. How's Auror training been lately?
It's been intense but I'm learning so much! We just started practicing stealth and tracking skills which has been fascinating.
That sounds really interesting! You'll be the greatest Auror ever in no time. Is it tough balancing studying and practical lessons?
It's definitely a lot! But I'm taking it one day at a time. Having a Defense Against the Dark Arts background helps too!
I'm sure that's really useful! You were always brilliant at Defense Against the Dark Arts. Let me know if you ever want to quiz each other to study!
Thanks, Ginny! That's a great idea, we should definitely do that sometime. Could be really helpful for us both.
For sure! Just say the word whenever you want to set up a study session. I should run though, early Quidditch practice tomorrow!
Sounds good! Good luck at practice tomorrow! Let me know how the Ravenclaw match goes!
We won against Ravenclaw! It was a really close match but we just managed to pull ahead in the end. I'm so proud of the team!
Ginny that's amazing!! Huge congratulations!! I knew you could do it. You must be thrilled!
Thank you, I'm over the moon! We're celebrating tonight in the common room. This is shaping up to be a great Quidditch season!
Enjoy the celebration, you all deserve it! Keep this up and that Quidditch Cup is as good as yours this year!
Thanks, Harry! I'm trying not to get ahead of myself but I'm feeling really good about our chances this season. How's your Auror studying going?
Studying is going well, thanks for asking! Stealth training exercises have been really interesting. Exhausting though!
That sounds fascinating but I can imagine it's tiring! Make sure to take care of yourself too. Have you been able to spend much time with Ron and Hermione?
I'm trying! It's hard to balance everything sometimes. I haven't seen Ron and Hermione much, though we write often. Hopefully I can visit Hogwarts soon!
You should definitely come visit! I know Ron and Hermione would love to see you, and of course I'd love to catch up in person.
That would be brilliant, I'll have to plan a trip soon! It'd be great to see a Quidditch match too and cheer you on!
Absolutely! You'd be the ultimate good luck charm. We've got a big one against Slytherin coming up I could really use your support at!
Say no more, I'll be there! No way I'd miss seeing you lead Gryffindor to victory over Slytherin!
Brilliant! It should be a really great match. We've been training extra hard to get ready for it.
I can't wait! Make sure the team gets lots of rest too though. You've all got this!
Thanks, we'll definitely be sure to rest up too! I know the Slytherin match will be tough but I think we can handle it.
